examples.example: 我每天都会抽出几分钟的时间来阅读，这让我受益匪浅。

translate.english: I will set aside a few minutes every day to read, which benefits me a lot.

examples.example: 我用短短几分钟就完成了这幅精美的画作，内心充满了成就感。

translate.english: I finished this exquisite painting in just a few minutes, and my heart was filled with a sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 我仅用了几分钟就把房间整理得井井有条，心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: I only used a few minutes to tidy up the room in an orderly manner, and I felt extremely comfortable.
